snippet: Bill de Blasio has gone sharply negative in his bid for mayor, as if trying to establish his position as Christine C. Quinn’s chief liberal challenger before Anthony D. Weiner usurps that role.
abstract: New York mayoral candidate Bill de Blasio, with specter of Anthony D Weiner joining already overcrowded field of Democratic contenders, has turned up intensity of his attacks on frontrunner Christine C Quinn; is seemingly trying to establish his position as Quinn's chief liberal challenger before a better known hopeful usurps that role.
lead_paragraph: Bill de Blasio has gone sharply negative in his bid for mayor, as if trying to establish his position as Christine C. Quinn’s chief liberal challenger before Anthony D. Weiner usurps that role.

headline.seo: Wary of Weiner, Bill de Blasio Assails Christine C. Quinn
headline.main: With Democratic Mayoral Field in Flux, de Blasio Assails Quinn
headline.print_headline: With Field in Flux, de Blasio Assails Quinn
